resources.string: Camera permission is needed to take pictures.
Location permission is needed to share location promotion.
Read/Write permission is needed to get/save photos of promotion you take.
Thank you for free access to camera! =)
Thank you for granting access to location, so we\'ll show promotions around you! =)
Thank you for granting access to save the photos.

Share the deals that are around you!

Keep track of deals that are close to you!

Made in HackDay by MoIP developers
